meanings.definition: Of or relating to a lumen
meanings.sent1: The lumenal space was brightly lit.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the lumenal properties of the tube.
meanings.sent3: The lumenal glow made the room feel magical.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as a lumenal beam.
meanings.sent5: The lumenal colors danced like fairies in the dark.

meanings.sent1: The lumenal fluid carried important nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The tiny organism thrived in the lumenal environment.
meanings.sent3: The lumenal surprise was finding a hidden treasure inside.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed in the lumenal chamber of the cave.
meanings.sent5: The lumenal pathway led to a secret garden.
